import React from "react"; import { SCREEN } from "../config/Config"; import "../styles/menu.css"; export default class Menu extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); } render() { const screen = this.props.screen; return(
EduLabs
this.props.redirect(SCREEN.DASHBOARD)}>
Dashboard
this.props.redirect(SCREEN.CLASSES)}>
Classes

Subjects

Profile
) } }
